key.name: length-cutoff
key.summary: Put window options in a submenu
key.description: If this many items or more are already in the appMenu, put the window options in a submenu. Set to -1 to ignore.

key.name: order
key.summary: Order of items in the menu.
key.description: Order of window options. You can put in: 'minimize', 'maximize', 'move', 'resize', 'raise', 'lower', 'always-on-top', 'always-on-visible-workspace', 'move-to-workspace', 'move-to-next-workspace', 'move-to-previous-workspace', 'close-window', and 'separator' (for a separator).

key.name: maximize-is-toggle
key.summary: Whether to display maximize/restore item as a toggle
key.description: Whether to display maximize/restore item as a toggle (if false it will be an item with alternating text).

key.name: always-on-visible-workspace-is-toggle
key.summary: Whether to display always on this/visible workspace item as a toggle
key.description: Whether to display always on this/visible workspace item as a toggle (if false it will be an item with alternating text).

key.name: always-on-top-is-toggle
key.summary: DO NOT CHANGE: Whether to display always on top item as a toggle
key.description: DO NOT CHANGE: Whether to display always on top item as a toggle.
